title: TCT Clip: Who was John Moriarty? - Finding Divine Ground (w/ Martin Shaw)
description:
A clip from my recent conversation with Martin Shaw. Martin talks about the mysterious writer, poet, talker and seer - the Irish figure John Moriarty.

To purchase the John Moriarty reader Martin Shaw edited, visit Lilliput Press: https://www.lilliputpress.ie/product/a-hut-at-the-edge-of-the-village-martin-shaw

To see our entire conversation, check out: https://www.thecommontoad.com/single-post/conversations-martin-shaw-until-the-illumination-arrives
